body:
Hi all,


The brute force method I have used to get Radiance installed on my OS X 
machines have been to download the pre-compiled binaries from the LBNL 
site, as well as the Head and Auxilliary files from 
radiance-online.org.  After copying all the binaries to /usr/local/bin 
from the pre-compiled binaries, I then ran through the ./makeall 
install script from the Head.  Don't know how kosher this is, but it 
seems to have worked.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-November/001268.html).</sup>
